"

How and Why use Esti

When working in an agile team, estimating story points might be a difficult task for team members. Combining the complexity, obscurity and dependencies to a single number is no easy task, not even for skilled scrummers. That's why we created Esti, a tool for teams ranging from complete beginners to expert scrummers.

How to use Esti?

Using Esti is simple, and can be done in different ways. Here's our suggestion for using Esti as part of your planning/estimation meeting.
1. The scrum master opens a group on Esti and adds all the team members.
2. The scrum master presents the story and gives a short description of the task.
3. Each scrummer marks on Esti the level of complexity, unclarity and dependecy he feels fit for the story presented.
4. Once all scrummers have filled in their story estimation measurements, Esti will present the final calculated story points for this task.
